## Analysis

```{r print-data}
loadd(park_data)
```

```{r breaks}
unique(park_data$date)
```


Approximately `r nt_park_status(park_data)` of parks in the nortern territory are open.

```{r create-openness-table}
park_data %>% 
  mutate(is_open = detect_open(access)) %>% 
  group_by(date) %>% 
  summarise(prop_open = mean(is_open),
            n_open = sum(is_open)) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```
